title: The MMA Road Show with John Morgan, No. 237 – Vegas: Justin Gaethje, Joanna Jedrzejczyk, Michelle Waterson, Ali Abdelaziz,
text:
Episode No. 237 of “The MMA Road Show with John Morgan” podcast is now available for streaming and download.

MMA Junkie lead staff reporter John Morgan hosts the show while traveling the world to cover the sport.

It’s an insanely busy weekend in the world of MMA, and John Morgan and Cold Coffee sit down on a beautiful Las Vegas afternoon to talk about it all. Morgan also shares his interviews with Ali Abdelaziz and Justin Gaethje from this week’s Dominance MMA media day, while also bringing you media day interviews from UFC Tampa headliners Joanna Jedrzejczyk and Michelle Waterson, courtesy of the young Mike Bohn.

Check it out on iTunes or at themmaroadshow.com. You can also subscribe via RSS.
description: Episode No. 237 of “The MMA Road Show with John Morgan” podcast is now available for streaming and download.
